## HTTP\_ERROR\_INTERCEPTOR\_PROVIDER variable

Provider for proper use of HttpErrorInterceptor, use this provider to inject this interceptor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
HTTP_ERROR_INTERCEPTOR_PROVIDER: ClassProvider
```
